resources.string-array:
An activity is responsible for managing user interaction with a screen of information?
true
Ctrl+Shift+O organizes imports in OSX?
false
A toast in android is an extra dialog that appears in another activity?
false
A model object holds the application data and application logic?
false
A model contains business logic?
true
View objects know how to draw themselves on the screen and how to respond to user input, like touches?
true
Controller contains business logic?
false
Controller contains application logic?
true
Does MVC makes class easier to reuse?
true
You can embed images in a Button?
true
You can use android:text on ImageButton?
false
You can log information using android.Log?
false
You can log information using android.util.Log?
true
An activity onDestroy method is called when using the back button and when rotating the screen?
true `
